EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Foundry Developer Bootcamp_Q315.Confirmation - Irving
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend the Pivotal Cloud Foundry Bootcamp in Irving
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the Verizon Employee Only Pivotal Cloud Foundry Bootcamp on {{lead.PCF Session Date:default=edit me}}. Your registration is confirmed. See event details below.
Time: 8:00am - 4:30pm Location: Room HQE02L09, 700 Hidden Ridge, Irving, TX 75038
Pre-requisite work is required for all registered attendees and can be completed here <https://pivotallms.biglms.com/courses/PivotalAcademy/PCF100/VWZP/about>.
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email gkortye@pivotal.io <mailto:gkortye@pivotal.io> or arshad.aziz@verizon.com <mailto:arshad.aziz@verizon.com>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
